content: In the shadowed city of Stenograd, where the Behavioral Compliance Index quietly shapes every life, engineer Lenart Kova risks everything by planting cryptic clues inside a beloved puzzle app. As curious citizens solve the daily riddles, they’re drawn into a clandestine scavenger hunt, uncovering lists of those the system has erased—names and dates that ignite shock and defiance. Whispers fly across encrypted networks; crowds grow restless. Fearing unrest, the Council’s Innovators hunt for the leak as the Directorate clamps down, but it’s too late—a wave of protests sweeps the city as people awaken to the truth, and Stenograd’s perfect order trembles on the brink of chaos.
